name: Nexus Mod Manager
description:
Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) renamed Vortex.
The elegant, powerful, and open-source mod manager from Nexus Mods.

This is a redundant page the frequented page for the "Vortex" the nexus mod manager for Lutris is here:

https://lutris.net/games/vortex-mod-manager/
